stripped_text: When you install Titanium Ribs, suffer 2 meat damage. You choose the card(s) from your grip to trash whenever you take damage (including the damage taken by installing Titanium Ribs).
text:
When you install Titanium Ribs, suffer 2 meat damage.
You choose the card(s) from your grip to trash whenever you take damage (including the damage taken by installing Titanium Ribs).
title: Titanium Ribs
